section.name: List of general configuration options
section.p: In Administration > Configuration there are a number of configuration values.

tr.td: Dashboard: If the MyRooms widget should be visible or not
Dashboard: If the Chat widget should be visible or not
Dashboard: If the RSS-Feed widget should be visible or not
Dashboard: ATOM-Feed URL for the dashboard RSS Tab
Dashboard: ATOM-Feed URL for the dashboard RSS Tab
minimum chars required for the login to create a user
minimum chars required for the password to create a user
minutes the one-time reminder in the calender is send, set to 0 to disable reminder
Maximum size of upload file (bytes) 1073741824 bytes = 1GB
Display name of the user who draw the current object (User Name auto-disapper after 3 seconds.
If the system should "." (old ffmpeg) instead of ":" (new ffmpeg) for the -map option in FFMPEG
this is the smtp server to send messages
this is the smtp server port normally 25
Socket connection timeout value in milliseconds. Default is 30 seconds (30000).
Socket I/O timeout value in milliseconds. Default is 30 seconds (30000).
all send e-mails by the system will have this address
Set inviter's email address as ReplyTo in email invitations (1 == set, 0 == NOT set)
The path to OpenOffice/LibreOffice (optional) please set this to the real path in case jodconverter is unable to find OpenOffice/LibreOffice installation automatically

Area to be shown to the user after login. Possible values are: user/dashboard, user/calendar, user/record, rooms/my, rooms/group, rooms/public, admin/user, admin/connection , admin/group, admin/room, admin/config, admin/lang, admin/ldap, admin/backup, admin/server, admin/oauth2
DPI for conversion of PDF to SWF (should be an integer between 50 and 600 with a default value of 100 DPI)
Compression quality for conversion of PDF to SWF (should be an integer between 1 and 100, with a default value of 85)
User get a EMail with their Account data. Values: 0(No) or 1(Yes)

User must activate their account by clicking on the activation-link in the registering Email. Values: 0(No) or 1(Yes) It makes no sense to make this(sendEmailWithVerficationCode) 1(Yes) while sendEmailAtRegister is 0(No) cause you need to send a EMail.
Users entered the room via invitationHash or secureHash will be redirected to this URL on connection lost
Is user register available on login screen
Is user register available via SOAP/REST
Is user register available via OAuth
Base URL your OPenmeetings installation will be accessible at.

Default selection in ScreenSharing Quality:
0 - bigger frame rate, no resize
1 - no resize
2 - size == 1/2 of selected area
3 - size == 3/8 of selected area
Is screensharing FPS should be displayed or not (true/false).
Is remote control will be enabled while screensharing. Allowing remote control will be not possible in case it is set to 'false' (true/false).
The day that each week begins. The value must be a number that represents the day of the week. Sunday=0, Monday=1, Tuesday=2, etc.
